data.title: Gustav Rydahl 2023
data.meta_description: The 2023-24 NHL season stats per game for Gustav Rydahl of the Colorado Avalanche on ESPN (UK). Includes full stats, per opponent, for regular and postseason.
data.text:
Maple Leafs officially name Auston Matthews their 26th captain

Auston Matthews was officially named the Maple Leafs' captain Wednesday, succeeding John Tavares, who had been captain since October 2019.

Who are the current NHL team captains? 2024-25 season list

Here is the full list of captains for NHL teams, with Auston Matthews the latest to earn the designation.

2024 NHL free agency tracker: News, contracts, grades, buzz

Our updated list features details on every player signed, analysis of those moves and buzz on what could happen next.

Jeff Vinik in talks to sell ownership stake in Lightning

Jeff Vinik is in talks to expand the Lightning's ownership group, he confirmed in a statement Tuesday, with the Tampa Bay Times reporting that he would be selling his majority stake in the team.
